pr_title: Add ability to automatically screenshot Barbarian Assault high gamble rewards

timeline.message: Add ability to automatically screenshot Barbarian Assault high gamble rewards
Fix spacing typo in parseBAHighGambleWidget comment
Change file name format for better ordering
Fix potential issue where onWidgetLoaded would not return if LEVEL_UP_GROUP_ID and screenshotHighGamble

timeline.bodyText: What is an example of text you'd receive when doing a high gamble? That should be added to this plugin's test cases.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: This should be formatted High Gamble(count) like other screenshots. I don't think putting the reward in the filename is valuable.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.message: Remove unused high gamble reward variable

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.message: Use Matcher.group(String name) for BA High Gamble captured text
